blocks.name: iscmn
blocks.content: The predicate "is a commutative monoid." (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscmn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccmn), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccmn, cmnd, wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))))
  bitrd(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wral(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))), wceq(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  raleqbi1dv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))
  raleq(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, c1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqd(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s1), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqd(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cplusg)
  df-cmn(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmnd)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, cv(hs0))
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, cv(hs0))
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscmn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CMnd ↔(c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)))))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccmn, cmnd, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))), ∀(s0 ∈(Base ` hs0), ∀(s1 ∈(Base ` hs0),(s0[(+ ` hs0)]s1)=(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0))))
  bitrd(hs0 = c0, ∀(s0 ∈(Base ` hs0), ∀(s1 ∈(Base ` hs0),(s0[(+ ` hs0)]s1)=(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[(+ ` hs0)]s1)=(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0))))
  syl(hs0 = c0, (∀(s0 ∈(Base ` hs0), ∀(s1 ∈(Base ` hs0),(s0[(+ ` hs0)]s1)=(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0)))↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[(+ ` hs0)]s1)=(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0)))), (Base ` hs0)= c1)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c1, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  raleqbi1dv(s0, (Base ` hs0), c1, ∀(s1 ∈(Base ` hs0),(s0[(+ ` hs0)]s1)=(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0)), ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[(+ ` hs0)]s1)=(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0)))
  raleq(s1, (Base ` hs0), c1, (s0[(+ ` hs0)]s1)=(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0))
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, c1, c1, hs0 = c0, (s0[(+ ` hs0)]s1)=(s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0), (s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))
  eqeq12d((s0[(+ ` hs0)]s1), (s1[(+ ` hs0)]s0), (s0[c2]s1), (s1[c2]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveqd(s0, (+ ` hs0), s1, c2, hs0 = c0)
  oveqd(s1, (+ ` hs0), s0, c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((+ ` hs0), c2, (+ ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cplusg)
  df-cmn(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmnd)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, hs0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, hs0)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: isabl2
blocks.content: The predicate "is an Abelian (commutative) group." (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isabl2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ccmn)))
  isabl(c0)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ccmn), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wb(wcel(c0, ccmn), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  grpmnd(c0)
  baib(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  iscmn(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isabl2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Abel ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)))))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈ Abel, (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)))), (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ CMnd))
  isabl(c0)
  pm5.32i(c0 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ CMnd, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))))
  syl(c0 ∈ Grp, (c0 ∈ CMnd ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0)))), c0 ∈ Mnd)
  grpmnd(c0)
  baib(c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ CMnd, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))))
  iscmn(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: cmnpropd
blocks.content: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is a commutative monoid iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmnpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, ccmn)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, ccmn), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)))))), wa(wcel(c1, cmnd), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)))))))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))))), wcel(c1, cmnd), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0))))))
  mndpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  3bitr3d(w0, wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))))), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0))))), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))))), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0))))))
  2ralbidva(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, w0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))))
  oveqrspc2v(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1), w0)
  ancom2s(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0))))
  oveqrspc2v(s0, s1, cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1), w0)
  raleqbidv(hs0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)))), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)))))
  raleqdv(hs1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))))
  raleqbidv(hs0, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), w0, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)))), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0)))))
  raleqdv(hs1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), w0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs0))))
  iscmn(hs0, hs1, c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  iscmn(hs0, hs1, c1, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cplusg, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cplusg, c1)
  diff.cplusg.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cplusg, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cplusg, c1)
  diff.cplusg.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cmnpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ CMnd ↔ c1 ∈ CMnd))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ CMnd, (c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0),(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)))), (c1 ∈ Mnd ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c1),(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs0)))))
  anbi12d(w0, c0 ∈ Mnd, ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0),(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))), c1 ∈ Mnd, ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c1),(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs0))))
  mndpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  3bitr3d(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0),(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))), ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c1),(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs0))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs0))))
  2ralbidva(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, w0, (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs0))
  eqeq12d((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1), (hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1), (hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs0), (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)))
  oveqrspc2v(s0, s1, hs0, c2, hs1, c2, (+ ` c0), (+ ` c1), w0)
  ancom2s(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, hs1 ∈ c2, (hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)=(hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs0))
  oveqrspc2v(s0, s1, hs1, c2, hs0, c2, (+ ` c0), (+ ` c1), w0)
  raleqbidv(hs0, c2, (Base ` c0), w0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0),(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)))
  raleqdv(hs1, c2, (Base ` c0), w0, (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))
  raleqbidv(hs0, c2, (Base ` c1), w0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs0)), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c1),(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs0)))
  raleqdv(hs1, c2, (Base ` c1), w0, (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c1)]hs0))
  iscmn(hs0, hs1, c0, (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  iscmn(hs0, hs1, c1, (Base ` c1), (+ ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: ablpropd
blocks.content: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is an Abelian group iff the other one is. (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cabl)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cabl), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ccmn)), wa(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, ccmn)))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, ccmn))
  grppropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  cmnpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  isabl(c0)
  isabl(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ Abel ↔ c1 ∈ Abel))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ Abel, (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ CMnd), (c1 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ CMnd))
  anbi12d(w0, c0 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ Grp, c1 ∈ CMnd)
  grppropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  cmnpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  isabl(c0)
  isabl(c1)
}

blocks.name: ablprop
blocks.content: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is an Abelian group iff the other one is. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablprop(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cabl))
  -| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1))
} = {
  mptru(wb(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cabl)))
  ablpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))))
  oveqi(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}

thm ablprop(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Abel ↔ c1 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ (+ ` c0)=(+ ` c1)
} = {
  mptru((c0 ∈ Abel ↔ c1 ∈ Abel))

  eqidd((Base ` c0), wtru)

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))

blocks.name: iscmnd
blocks.content: Properties that determine a commutative monoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)

thm iscmnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  sylibr(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)))))))
  mpbi2and(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  ralrimivv(s0, s1, c1, c1, w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  3expib(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  anbi2d(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)))))
  raleqbidv(s1, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), w0)
  oveqd(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), w0)
  oveqd(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), w0)
  iscmn(s0, s1, c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
}

blocks.content: Properties that determine an Abelian group. (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm isabld(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  iscmnd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  grpmnd(c0)
  isabl(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isabld(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(Base ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(+ ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ∈ Abel, c0 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ CMnd)
  iscmnd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ Grp)
  grpmnd(c0)
  isabl(c0)
}

thm isabli(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(c0, cabl)

} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c0, cgrp), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  rgen2a(s0, s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  isabl2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isabli(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ c0 ∈ Abel
  ⊣ c0 ∈ Grp

  ⊣ c2 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(s0[c2]s1)=(s1[c2]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {

blocks.name: cmnmnd
blocks.content: A commutative monoid is a monoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: cmncom
blocks.content: A commutative monoid is commutative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmncom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1)))
  caovcomg(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c4, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  sylan(wcel(c0, ccmn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs0))), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs0))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, ccmn), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  iscmn(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c4)
  imp(wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs0))))
  rsp2(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ccmn))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, ccmn))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cmncom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CMnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3)=(c3[c4]c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  3impb(c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c1[c4]c3)=(c3[c4]c1))
  caovcomg(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c4, c0 ∈ CMnd)
  sylan(c0 ∈ CMnd, (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), (hs0[c4]hs1)=(hs1[c4]hs0), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0[c4]hs1)=(hs1[c4]hs0))))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ CMnd, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0[c4]hs1)=(hs1[c4]hs0))), c0 ∈ Mnd)
  iscmn(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c4)
  imp(∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0[c4]hs1)=(hs1[c4]hs0))), (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), (hs0[c4]hs1)=(hs1[c4]hs0))
  rsp2(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, (hs0[c4]hs1)=(hs1[c4]hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ CMnd)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ CMnd)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: cmn32
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law for Abelian groups. (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmn32(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccmn), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  mnd32g(c1, c5, c3, c4, c2, c0, wa(wcel(c0, ccmn), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccmn), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  simpr1(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c3, c5, c4), co(c4, c5, c3)))
  cmncom(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cmn32(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CMnd ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→((c1[c5]c3)[c5]c4)=((c1[c5]c4)[c5]c3))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  mnd32g(c1, c5, c3, c4, c2, c0, (c0 ∈ CMnd ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  adantr(c0 ∈ CMnd, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), c0 ∈ Mnd)
  cmnmnd(c0)
  simpr1(c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  simpr2(c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  simpr3(c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  3adant3r1(c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c3[c5]c4)=(c4[c5]c3))
  cmncom(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5)
}

blocks.name: cmn4
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law for Abelian groups. (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmn4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(c4, c6, c5)), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c6, co(c3, c6, c5))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  mnd4g(c1, c6, c3, c4, c5, c2, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, ccmn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  simp2l(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  simp3r(wcel(c0, ccmn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(c3, c6, c4), co(c4, c6, c3)), wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simp1(wcel(c0, ccmn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  simp2r(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  simp3l(wcel(c0, ccmn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  cmncom(c0, c3, c2, c4, c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cmn4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CMnd ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2))→((c1[c6]c3)[c6](c4[c6]c5))=((c1[c6]c4)[c6](c3[c6]c5)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  mnd4g(c1, c6, c3, c4, c5, c2, c0, (c0 ∈ CMnd ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)))
  syl((c0 ∈ CMnd ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ CMnd)
  cmnmnd(c0)
  simp2l(c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2))
  simp3r(c0 ∈ CMnd, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c4 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c2)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ CMnd ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), (c3[c6]c4)=(c4[c6]c3), c0 ∈ CMnd, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  simp1(c0 ∈ CMnd, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2))
  simp2r(c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2))
  simp3l(c0 ∈ CMnd, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c4 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c2)
  cmncom(c0, c3, c2, c4, c6)
}

blocks.name: cmn12
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law for Abelian monoids. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmn12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccmn), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c3, c5, co(c1, c5, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  mnd12g(c1, c5, c3, c4, c2, c0, wa(wcel(c0, ccmn), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccmn), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  simpr1(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c1, c5, c3), co(c3, c5, c1)))
  cmncom(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cmn12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CMnd ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→(c1[c5](c3[c5]c4))=(c3[c5](c1[c5]c4)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  mnd12g(c1, c5, c3, c4, c2, c0, (c0 ∈ CMnd ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  adantr(c0 ∈ CMnd, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), c0 ∈ Mnd)
  cmnmnd(c0)
  simpr1(c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  simpr2(c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  simpr3(c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  3adant3r3(c0 ∈ CMnd, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c1[c5]c3)=(c3[c5]c1))
  cmncom(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
}

blocks.name: abl32
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law for Abelian groups. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm abl32(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
} = {
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, c2)), wcel(c5, ccmn), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, ccmn), wcel(c5, cabl))
  ablcmn(c5)
  cmn32(c5, c0, c4, c2, c3, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm abl32(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3)=((c0[c1]c3)[c1]c2))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c1 =(+ ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
} = {
  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3)=((c0[c1]c3)[c1]c2), c5 ∈ CMnd, c0 ∈ c4, c2 ∈ c4, c3 ∈ c4)
  syl(w0, c5 ∈ CMnd, c5 ∈ Abel)
  ablcmn(c5)
  cmn32(c5, c0, c4, c2, c3, c1)
}

blocks.name: ablinvadd
blocks.content: The inverse of an Abelian group operation. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablinvadd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(cfv(c4, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cminusg, c0))
} = {
  eqtr4d(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(cfv(c4, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c3)), co(cfv(c4, c3), c5, cfv(c4, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(cfv(c4, c3), c5, cfv(c4, c1))), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  grpinvadd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(cfv(c4, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c3)), co(cfv(c4, c3), c5, cfv(c4, c1))), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), c2))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  grpinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cfv(c4, c3), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ablgrp(c0)
  simp3(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  grpinvcl(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  ablcom(c0, cfv(c4, c1), c2, cfv(c4, c3), c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablinvadd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c4 `(c1[c5]c3))=((c4 ` c1)[c5](c4 ` c3)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(invg ` c0)
} = {
  eqtr4d((c4 `(c1[c5]c3)), ((c4 ` c1)[c5](c4 ` c3)), ((c4 ` c3)[c5](c4 ` c1)), (c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  syl3an1(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c4 `(c1[c5]c3))=((c4 ` c3)[c5](c4 ` c1)), c0 ∈ Grp)
  grpinvadd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ((c4 ` c1)[c5](c4 ` c3))=((c4 ` c3)[c5](c4 ` c1)), c0 ∈ Abel, (c4 ` c1)∈ c2, (c4 ` c3)∈ c2)
  simp1(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c4 ` c1)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp, c1 ∈ c2)
  simp2(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c4 ` c3)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp, c3 ∈ c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp)
  ablgrp(c0)
  simp3(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  ablcom(c0, (c4 ` c1), c2, (c4 ` c3), c5)
}

blocks.name: ablsub2inv
blocks.content: Abelian group subtraction of two inverses. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablsub2inv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(c0, c3)), co(c3, c2, c1)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csg, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cminusg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(c0, c3)), co(c3, c2, c1), co(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), w0)
  grpsubinv(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c0, c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), c4, c5, w0)
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), cfv(c0, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c3))), w0)
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), cfv(c0, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c3))), co(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), w0)
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), co(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c1))), wcel(c5, cabl), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c4), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c1, c4))
  grpinvcl(c5, c1, c4, c0)
  ablcom(c5, cfv(c0, c1), c4, c3, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  oveq1d(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c1), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c3)), c3), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c3, c4))
  grpinvinv(c5, c3, c4, c0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c3))), co(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c1))), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), c4))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c3), c4), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c3, c4))
  grpinvcl(c5, c3, c4, c0)
  grpinvadd(c5, c1, c4, cfv(c0, c3), c0, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  fveq2d(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c3)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c1, c2, c3), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c3))), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  grpsubval(c1, c4, c3, c2, cfv(cplusg, c5), c0, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c5))
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c3, c2, c1)), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c5, cabl))
  ablgrp(c5)
  grpinvsub(c5, c1, c4, c3, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: ablsubadd
blocks.content: Relationship between Abelian group subtraction and addition. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablsubadd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wb(wceq(co(c1, c5, c3), c4), wceq(co(c3, c6, c4), c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, c3), c4), wceq(co(c3, c6, c4), c1), wceq(co(c4, c6, c3), c1))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wb(wceq(co(c1, c5, c3), c4), wceq(co(c4, c6, c3), c1)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ablgrp(c0)
  grpsubadd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  eqeq1d(co(c3, c6, c4), c1, co(c4, c6, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c3, c6, c4), co(c4, c6, c3)))
  ablcom(c0, c3, c2, c4, c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablsubadd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→((c1[c5]c3)= c4 ↔(c3[c6]c4)= c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(-g ` c0)
} = {
  bitr4d((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), (c1[c5]c3)= c4, (c3[c6]c4)= c1, (c4[c6]c3)= c1)
  sylan(c0 ∈ Abel, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), ((c1[c5]c3)= c4 ↔(c4[c6]c3)= c1), c0 ∈ Grp)
  ablgrp(c0)
  grpsubadd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  eqeq1d((c3[c6]c4), c1, (c4[c6]c3), (c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  3adant3r1(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c3[c6]c4)=(c4[c6]c3))
  ablcom(c0, c3, c2, c4, c6)
}

blocks.name: ablsub4
blocks.content: Commutative/associative subtraction law for Abelian groups. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)

thm ablsub4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2))→((c1[c6]c3)[c7](c4[c6]c5))=((c1[c7]c4)[c6](c3[c7]c5)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(-g ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c1[c6]c3)[c7](c4[c6]c5)), ((c1[c7]c4)[c6](c3[c7]c5)), ((c1[c6]c3)[c6]((invg ` c0)`(c4[c6]c5))), (c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), ((c1[c6]c3)[c7](c4[c6]c5))=((c1[c6]c3)[c6]((invg ` c0)`(c4[c6]c5))), (c1[c6]c3)∈ c2, (c4[c6]c5)∈ c2)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), (c1[c6]c3)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  grpcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), (c4[c6]c5)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp, c4 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c2)
  grpcl(c0, c4, c2, c5, c6)
  grpsubval((c1[c6]c3), c2, (c4[c6]c5), c7, c6, (invg ` c0), c0)
  3eqtr4d(((c1[c6]c3)[c6]((invg ` c0)`(c4[c6]c5))), ((c1[c7]c4)[c6](c3[c7]c5)), ((c1[c6]c3)[c6](((invg ` c0)` c4)[c6]((invg ` c0)` c5))), ((c1[c6]((invg ` c0)` c4))[c6](c3[c6]((invg ` c0)` c5))), (c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)))
  syl112anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), ((c1[c6]c3)[c6](((invg ` c0)` c4)[c6]((invg ` c0)` c5)))=((c1[c6]((invg ` c0)` c4))[c6](c3[c6]((invg ` c0)` c5))), c0 ∈ CMnd, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ((invg ` c0)` c4)∈ c2, ((invg ` c0)` c5)∈ c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ Abel, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2), c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ablcmn(c0)
  simp2(c0 ∈ Abel, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), ((invg ` c0)` c4)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp, c4 ∈ c2)
  grpinvcl(c0, c4, c2, (invg ` c0))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), ((invg ` c0)` c5)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp, c5 ∈ c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ Abel, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2), c0 ∈ Grp)
  ablgrp(c0)
  grpinvcl(c0, c5, c2, (invg ` c0))
  cmn4(c0, c1, c2, c3, ((invg ` c0)` c4), ((invg ` c0)` c5), c6)
  oveq2d((c1[c6]c3), c6, ((invg ` c0)`(c4[c6]c5)), (((invg ` c0)` c4)[c6]((invg ` c0)` c5)), (c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), ((invg ` c0)`(c4[c6]c5))=(((invg ` c0)` c4)[c6]((invg ` c0)` c5)), c0 ∈ Abel, c4 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c2)

  ablinvadd(c0, c4, c2, c5, (invg ` c0), c6)
  oveq12d((c1[c7]c4), c6, (c3[c7]c5), (c1[c6]((invg ` c0)` c4)), (c3[c6]((invg ` c0)` c5)), (c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), (c1[c7]c4)=(c1[c6]((invg ` c0)` c4)), c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  simp2l(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2))
  simp3l(c0 ∈ Abel, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c4 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c2)

  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), (c3[c7]c5)=(c3[c6]((invg ` c0)` c5)), c3 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c2)
  simp2r(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2))
  simp3r(c0 ∈ Abel, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c4 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c2)
  grpsubval(c3, c2, c5, c7, c6, (invg ` c0), c0)
  eqid((invg ` c0))
}

  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c6, co(c5, c7, c3)), co(c5, c7, c3)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(co(c5, c7, c3), c2))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wcel(co(c5, c7, c3), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ablgrp(c0)
  simp3r(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  simp2r(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  grpsubcl(c0, c5, c2, c3, c7)
  grplid(c0, co(c5, c7, c3), c2, cfv(c0g, c0), c6)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
}

blocks.name: abladdsub
blocks.content: Associative-type law for group subtraction and addition. (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm abladdsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, c4), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c5, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, c4), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c5, c3), co(co(c3, c5, c1), c6, c4), co(c3, c5, co(c1, c6, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  oveq1d(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, c4, co(c3, c5, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c1, c5, c3), co(c3, c5, c1)))
  ablcom(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c3, c5, c1), c6, c4), co(c3, c5, co(c1, c6, c4))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpaddsubass(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5, c6)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c3, c5, co(c1, c6, c4)), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c5, c3)), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c1, c6, c4), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(co(c1, c6, c4), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ablgrp(c0)
  simpr1(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpsubcl(c0, c1, c2, c4, c6)
  ablcom(c0, c3, c2, co(c1, c6, c4), c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm abladdsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→((c1[c5]c3)[c6]c4)=((c1[c6]c4)[c5]c3))

  oveq1d((c1[c5]c3), c6, c4, (c3[c5]c1), (c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  3adant3r3(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c1[c5]c3)=(c3[c5]c1))
  ablcom(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  syl13anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), ((c3[c5]c1)[c6]c4)=(c3[c5](c1[c6]c4)), c0 ∈ Grp, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  grpaddsubass(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5, c6)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), (c3[c5](c1[c6]c4))=((c1[c6]c4)[c5]c3), c0 ∈ Abel, c3 ∈ c2, (c1[c6]c4)∈ c2)
  simpl(c0 ∈ Abel, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))
  simpr2(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), (c1[c6]c4)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Abel, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), c0 ∈ Grp)
  ablgrp(c0)

blocks.name: ablpncan2
blocks.content: Cancellation law for subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablpncan2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c5, c1), c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c5, c1), c3, co(co(c1, c5, c1), c4, c3), co(cfv(c0g, c0), c4, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl13anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c4, c3), c5, c1), co(co(c1, c5, c1), c4, c3)), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  abladdsub(c0, c1, c2, c3, c1, c4, c5)
  oveq1d(co(c1, c5, c1), c4, c3, cfv(c0g, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c5, c1), cfv(c0g, c0)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  grpsubid(c0, c1, c2, c5, cfv(c0g, c0))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), c4, c3), c3), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, cabl))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  ablgrp(c0)
  simp3(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  grplid(c0, c3, c2, cfv(c0g, c0), c4)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablpncan2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→((c1[c4]c3)[c5]c1)= c3)

  syl13anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ((c1[c4]c3)[c5]c1)=((c1[c5]c1)[c4]c3), c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  abladdsub(c0, c1, c2, c3, c1, c4, c5)
  oveq1d((c1[c5]c1), c4, c3, (0 ` c0), (c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))

  simp2(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)

  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ((0 ` c0)[c4]c3)= c3, c0 ∈ Grp, c3 ∈ c2)

blocks.name: ablpncan3
blocks.content: A cancellation law for commutative groups. (Contributed by NM, 23-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablpncan3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c4, co(c3, c5, c1)), c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c1, c4, co(c3, c5, c1)), c3, co(co(c3, c5, c1), c4, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c4, co(c3, c5, c1)), co(co(c3, c5, c1), c4, c1)), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c3, c5, c1), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wcel(co(c3, c5, c1), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  grpsubcl(c0, c3, c2, c1, c5)
  ablcom(c0, c1, c2, co(c3, c5, c1), c4)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wceq(co(co(c3, c5, c1), c4, c1), c3), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cabl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ablgrp(c0)
  simprr(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  grpnpcan(c0, c3, c2, c1, c5, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablpncan3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))→(c1[c4](c3[c5]c1))= c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)

} = {

  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)), (c1[c4](c3[c5]c1))=((c3[c5]c1)[c4]c1), c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, (c3[c5]c1)∈ c2)
  simpl(c0 ∈ Abel, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)), (c3[c5]c1)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  grpsubcl(c0, c3, c2, c1, c5)
  ablcom(c0, c1, c2, (c3[c5]c1), c4)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)), ((c3[c5]c1)[c4]c1)= c3, c0 ∈ Grp, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Abel, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c0 ∈ Grp)
  ablgrp(c0)

  simprl(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)

blocks.name: ablsubsub
blocks.content: Law for double subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablsubsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3)), co(co(c0, c1, c2), c4, c3)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csg, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
} = {
  3eqtr2d(co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3)), co(co(c0, c1, c2), c4, c3), co(c0, c4, co(c3, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3)), co(c0, c4, co(c3, c1, c2))), wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c3, c5))
  grpsubsub(c6, c0, c5, c2, c3, c1, c4)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2), co(c0, c4, co(c3, c1, c2))), wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c6, cabl))
  ablgrp(c6)
  grpaddsubass(c6, c0, c5, c3, c2, c4, c1)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2), co(co(c0, c1, c2), c4, c3)), wcel(c6, cabl), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  abladdsub(c6, c0, c5, c3, c2, c4, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablsubsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1](c2[c1]c3))=((c0[c1]c2)[c4]c3))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(-g ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
} = {
  3eqtr2d((c0[c1](c2[c1]c3)), ((c0[c1]c2)[c4]c3), (c0[c4](c3[c1]c2)), ((c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, (c0[c1](c2[c1]c3))=(c0[c4](c3[c1]c2)), c6 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5, c3 ∈ c5)
  grpsubsub(c6, c0, c5, c2, c3, c1, c4)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2)=(c0[c4](c3[c1]c2)), c6 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ c5, c3 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  syl(w0, c6 ∈ Grp, c6 ∈ Abel)
  ablgrp(c6)
  grpaddsubass(c6, c0, c5, c3, c2, c4, c1)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2)=((c0[c1]c2)[c4]c3), c6 ∈ Abel, c0 ∈ c5, c3 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  abladdsub(c6, c0, c5, c3, c2, c4, c1)
}

blocks.name: ablsubsub4
blocks.content: Law for double subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablsubsub4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c4, c3))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csg, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
} = {
  3eqtr2d(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c4, c3)), co(co(c0, c1, c2), c4, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c3)), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c3))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(co(c0, c1, c2), c4, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c3))), wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c5), wcel(c3, c5))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c5), wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  grpsubcl(c6, c0, c5, c2, c1)
  grpsubval(co(c0, c1, c2), c5, c3, c1, c4, cfv(cminusg, c6), c6)
  ablsubsub(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c3), c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c3), c5), wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c3, c5))
  grpinvcl(c6, c3, c5, cfv(cminusg, c6))
  oveq2d(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c3)), co(c2, c4, c3), w0)
  grpsubinv(c2, c1, cfv(cminusg, c6), c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c6))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c6, cabl))
  ablgrp(c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablsubsub4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3)=(c0[c1](c2[c4]c3)))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(-g ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
} = {
  3eqtr2d(((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3), (c0[c1](c2[c4]c3)), ((c0[c1]c2)[c4]((invg ` c6)` c3)), (c0[c1](c2[c1]((invg ` c6)` c3))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3)=((c0[c1]c2)[c4]((invg ` c6)` c3)), (c0[c1]c2)∈ c5, c3 ∈ c5)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[c1]c2)∈ c5, c6 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  grpsubcl(c6, c0, c5, c2, c1)
  grpsubval((c0[c1]c2), c5, c3, c1, c4, (invg ` c6), c6)
  ablsubsub(c0, c1, c2, ((invg ` c6)` c3), c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((invg ` c6)` c3)∈ c5, c6 ∈ Grp, c3 ∈ c5)
  grpinvcl(c6, c3, c5, (invg ` c6))
  oveq2d(c0, c1, (c2[c1]((invg ` c6)` c3)), (c2[c4]c3), w0)
  grpsubinv(c2, c1, (invg ` c6), c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  eqid((invg ` c6))
  syl(w0, c6 ∈ Grp, c6 ∈ Abel)
  ablgrp(c6)
}

blocks.name: ablpnpcan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for mixed addition and subtraction. ( ~ pnpcan analog.) (Contributed by NM, 29-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablpnpcan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, c4)), co(c2, c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(csg, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, c4)), co(c2, c3, c4), co(co(c0, c3, c0), c1, co(c2, c3, c4)), co(cfv(c0g, c6), c1, co(c2, c3, c4)), w0)
  syl122anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, c4)), co(co(c0, c3, c0), c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), wcel(c6, cabl), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c4, c5))
  ablsub4(c6, c0, c5, c2, c0, c4, c1, c3)
  oveq1d(co(c0, c3, c0), c1, co(c2, c3, c4), cfv(c0g, c6), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c3, c0), cfv(c0g, c6)), wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c0, c5))
  grpsubid(c6, c0, c5, c3, cfv(c0g, c6))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c6), c1, co(c2, c3, c4)), co(c2, c3, c4)), wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(co(c2, c3, c4), c5))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c2, c3, c4), c5), wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c4, c5))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c6, cabl))
  ablgrp(c6)
  grpsubcl(c6, c2, c5, c4, c3)
  grplid(c6, co(c2, c3, c4), c5, cfv(c0g, c6), c1)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c6))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablpnpcan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4))=(c2[c3]c4))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(+ ` c6)
  ⊣ c3 =(-g ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
} = {
  3eqtrd(((c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4)), (c2[c3]c4), ((c0[c3]c0)[c1](c2[c3]c4)), ((0 ` c6)[c1](c2[c3]c4)), w0)
  syl122anc(w0, ((c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4))=((c0[c3]c0)[c1](c2[c3]c4)), c6 ∈ Abel, c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5, c0 ∈ c5, c4 ∈ c5)
  ablsub4(c6, c0, c5, c2, c0, c4, c1, c3)
  oveq1d((c0[c3]c0), c1, (c2[c3]c4), (0 ` c6), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[c3]c0)=(0 ` c6), c6 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ c5)
  grpsubid(c6, c0, c5, c3, (0 ` c6))
  syl2anc(w0, ((0 ` c6)[c1](c2[c3]c4))=(c2[c3]c4), c6 ∈ Grp, (c2[c3]c4)∈ c5)
  syl3anc(w0, (c2[c3]c4)∈ c5, c6 ∈ Grp, c2 ∈ c5, c4 ∈ c5)
  syl(w0, c6 ∈ Grp, c6 ∈ Abel)
  ablgrp(c6)
  grpsubcl(c6, c2, c5, c4, c3)
  grplid(c6, (c2[c3]c4), c5, (0 ` c6), c1)
  eqid((0 ` c6))
}

blocks.name: ablnncan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for group subtraction. ( ~ nncan analog.) (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablnncan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, co(c0, c1, c2)), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csg, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, c1, co(c0, c1, c2)), c2, co(co(c0, c1, c0), cfv(cplusg, c4), c2), co(cfv(c0g, c4), cfv(cplusg, c4), c2), w0)
  ablsubsub(c0, c1, c0, c2, cfv(cplusg, c4), c3, c4, w0)
  oveq1d(co(c0, c1, c0), cfv(cplusg, c4), c2, cfv(c0g, c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c0), cfv(c0g, c4)), wcel(c4, cgrp), wcel(c0, c3))
  grpsubid(c4, c0, c3, c1, cfv(c0g, c4))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c4), cfv(cplusg, c4), c2), c2), wcel(c4, cgrp), wcel(c2, c3))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, cgrp), wcel(c4, cabl))
  ablgrp(c4)
  grplid(c4, c2, c3, cfv(c0g, c4), cfv(cplusg, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c4))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablnncan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1](c0[c1]c2))= c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(-g ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
} = {
  3eqtrd((c0[c1](c0[c1]c2)), c2, ((c0[c1]c0)[(+ ` c4)]c2), ((0 ` c4)[(+ ` c4)]c2), w0)
  ablsubsub(c0, c1, c0, c2, (+ ` c4), c3, c4, w0)
  oveq1d((c0[c1]c0), (+ ` c4), c2, (0 ` c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[c1]c0)=(0 ` c4), c4 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ c3)
  grpsubid(c4, c0, c3, c1, (0 ` c4))
  syl2anc(w0, ((0 ` c4)[(+ ` c4)]c2)= c2, c4 ∈ Grp, c2 ∈ c3)
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ Grp, c4 ∈ Abel)
  ablgrp(c4)
  grplid(c4, c2, c3, (0 ` c4), (+ ` c4))
  eqid((+ ` c4))
  eqid((0 ` c4))
}

blocks.name: ablsub32
blocks.content: Swap the second and third terms in a double group subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablsub32(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, c2), co(c0, c1, co(c2, cfv(cplusg, c5), c3)), co(c0, c1, co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), c2)), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, c1, co(c2, cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), c2), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(c2, cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), c2)), wcel(c5, cabl), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  ablcom(c5, c2, c4, c3, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  ablsubsub4(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), c4, c5, w0)
  ablsubsub4(c0, c1, c3, c2, cfv(cplusg, c5), c4, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c5))
}

blocks.name: ablnnncan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for group subtraction. ( ~ nnncan analog.) (Contributed by NM, 29-Feb-2008.) (Revised by AV, 27-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablnnncan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3)), c1, c3), co(c0, c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3)), c1, c3), co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c1, co(co(c2, c1, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3)), w0)
  ablsubsub4(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3), c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), c4, c5, w0)
  oveq2d(c0, c1, co(co(c2, c1, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), c2, w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(c2, c1, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), c2, co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), co(c2, c1, c3)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c2, c1, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), co(c2, c1, c3))), wcel(c5, cabl), wcel(co(c2, c1, c3), c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c2, c1, c3), c4), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c5, cabl))
  ablgrp(c5)
  grpsubcl(c5, c2, c4, c3, c1)
  ablcom(c5, co(c2, c1, c3), c4, c3, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  syl12anc(w0, wceq(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), co(c2, c1, c3)), c2), wcel(c5, cabl), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c2, c4))
  ablpncan3(c5, c3, c4, c2, cfv(cplusg, c5), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c5))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablnnncan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[c1](c2[c1]c3))[c1]c3)=(c0[c1]c2))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c1 =(-g ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c0[c1](c2[c1]c3))[c1]c3), (c0[c1]c2), (c0[c1]((c2[c1]c3)[(+ ` c5)]c3)), w0)
  ablsubsub4(c0, c1, (c2[c1]c3), c3, (+ ` c5), c4, c5, w0)
  oveq2d(c0, c1, ((c2[c1]c3)[(+ ` c5)]c3), c2, w0)
  eqtrd(((c2[c1]c3)[(+ ` c5)]c3), c2, (c3[(+ ` c5)](c2[c1]c3)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, ((c2[c1]c3)[(+ ` c5)]c3)=(c3[(+ ` c5)](c2[c1]c3)), c5 ∈ Abel, (c2[c1]c3)∈ c4, c3 ∈ c4)
  syl3anc(w0, (c2[c1]c3)∈ c4, c5 ∈ Grp, c2 ∈ c4, c3 ∈ c4)
  syl(w0, c5 ∈ Grp, c5 ∈ Abel)
  ablgrp(c5)
  grpsubcl(c5, c2, c4, c3, c1)
  ablcom(c5, (c2[c1]c3), c4, c3, (+ ` c5))
  syl12anc(w0, (c3[(+ ` c5)](c2[c1]c3))= c2, c5 ∈ Abel, c3 ∈ c4, c2 ∈ c4)
  ablpncan3(c5, c3, c4, c2, (+ ` c5), c1)
  eqid((+ ` c5))
}

blocks.name: ablnnncan1
blocks.content: Cancellation law for group subtraction. ( ~ nnncan1 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablnnncan1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, co(c0, c1, c3)), co(c3, c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, co(c0, c1, c3)), co(c3, c1, c2), co(co(c0, c1, co(c0, c1, c3)), c1, c2), w0)
  ablsub32(c0, c1, c2, co(c0, c1, c3), c4, c5, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c3), c4), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c5, cabl))
  ablgrp(c5)
  grpsubcl(c5, c0, c4, c3, c1)
  oveq1d(co(c0, c1, co(c0, c1, c3)), c1, c2, c3, w0)
  ablnncan(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablnnncan1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[c1]c2)[c1](c0[c1]c3))=(c3[c1]c2))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c1 =(-g ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c0[c1]c2)[c1](c0[c1]c3)), (c3[c1]c2), ((c0[c1](c0[c1]c3))[c1]c2), w0)
  ablsub32(c0, c1, c2, (c0[c1]c3), c4, c5, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[c1]c3)∈ c4, c5 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ c4, c3 ∈ c4)
  syl(w0, c5 ∈ Grp, c5 ∈ Abel)
  ablgrp(c5)
  grpsubcl(c5, c0, c4, c3, c1)
  oveq1d((c0[c1](c0[c1]c3)), c1, c2, c3, w0)
  ablnncan(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, w0)
}

blocks.name: ablsubsub23
blocks.content: Swap subtrahend and result of group subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2007.) (Revised by AV, 7-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablsubsub23(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wb(wceq(co(c1, c5, c3), c4), wceq(co(c1, c5, c4), c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, c3), c4), wceq(co(c1, c5, c4), c3), wceq(co(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c1), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4), c1))
  eqeq1d(co(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c1, co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4), wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4)), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  ablcom(c0, c4, c2, c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wb(wceq(co(c1, c5, c3), c4), wceq(co(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c1)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  grpsubadd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cabl), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wb(wceq(co(c1, c5, c4), c3), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4), c1)), wcel(c0, cgrp), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  ablgrp(c0)
  biimpi(w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3ancomb(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpsubadd(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablsubsub23(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→((c1[c5]c3)= c4 ↔(c1[c5]c4)= c3))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(-g ` c0)
} = {
  3bitr4d((c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), (c1[c5]c3)= c4, (c1[c5]c4)= c3, (c4[(+ ` c0)]c3)= c1, (c3[(+ ` c0)]c4)= c1)
  eqeq1d((c4[(+ ` c0)]c3), c1, (c3[(+ ` c0)]c4), (c0 ∈ Abel ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))

blocks.name: mulgmhm
blocks.content: The map from ` x ` to ` n x ` for a fixed positive integer ` n ` is a monoid homomorphism if the monoid is commutative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2015.)

blocks.name: ghmabl
blocks.content: The image of an abelian group ` G ` under a group homomorphism ` F ` is an abelian group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ghmabl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cabl))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cfv(c6, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c5, cfv(c6, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c6, c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cabl))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  ghmgrp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c6, c4, c5, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c2, cabl))
  ablgrp(c2)
  ghmcmn(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, ccmn), wcel(c2, cabl))
  ablcmn(c2)
  isabl(c0)
}

thm ghmabl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c2)
  ⊣ c5 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(c6 `(s0[c4]s1))=((c6 ` s0)[c5](c6 ` s1)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6 : c1 ↠ c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ∈ Abel, c0 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ghmgrp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c6, c4, c5, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ Grp, c2 ∈ Abel)
  ablgrp(c2)
  ghmcmn(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ CMnd, c2 ∈ Abel)
  ablcmn(c2)
  isabl(c0)
}

blocks.name: invghm
blocks.content: The inversion map is a group automorphism if and only if the group is abelian. (In general it is only a group homomorphism into the opposite group, but in an abelian group the opposite group coincides with the group itself.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:

thm eqgabl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(c3, c4, c5), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(co(c5, c6, c3), c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csg, c0))

} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2)), wbr(c3, c4, c5), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(co(c5, c6, c3), c1)), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), cfv(cplusg, c0), c5), c1)))

  3bitr4g(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), cfv(cplusg, c0), c5), c1)), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(co(c5, c6, c3), c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), cfv(cplusg, c0), c5), c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(co(c5, c6, c3), c1)))
  pm5.32da(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), cfv(cplusg, c0), c5), c1), wcel(co(c5, c6, c3), c1))
  eleq1d(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), cfv(cplusg, c0), c5), c1, co(c5, c6, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), cfv(cplusg, c0), c5), co(c5, c6, c3), co(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), cfv(cplusg, c0), c5), co(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3))), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c3, c2))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ablgrp(c0)
  grpinvcl(c0, c3, c2, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  ablcom(c0, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3), c2, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(c5, c6, c3), co(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), c3))), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2))

thm eqgabl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→(c3[c4]c5 ↔(c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2 ∧(c5[c6]c3)∈ c1)))

} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), c3[c4]c5, (c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2 ∧(c5[c6]c3)∈ c1), (c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2 ∧(((invg ` c0)` c3)[(+ ` c0)]c5)∈ c1))
  eqgval(c0, cabl, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, (invg ` c0), (+ ` c0))
  3bitr4g((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), (c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2 ∧(((invg ` c0)` c3)[(+ ` c0)]c5)∈ c1), (c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2 ∧(c5[c6]c3)∈ c1), ((c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)∧(((invg ` c0)` c3)[(+ ` c0)]c5)∈ c1), ((c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)∧(c5[c6]c3)∈ c1))
  pm5.32da((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), (c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2), (((invg ` c0)` c3)[(+ ` c0)]c5)∈ c1, (c5[c6]c3)∈ c1)
  eleq1d((((invg ` c0)` c3)[(+ ` c0)]c5), c1, (c5[c6]c3), ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧(c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)))
  eqtr4d((((invg ` c0)` c3)[(+ ` c0)]c5), (c5[c6]c3), (c5[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c3)), ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧(c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧(c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), (((invg ` c0)` c3)[(+ ` c0)]c5)=(c5[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c3)), c0 ∈ Abel, ((invg ` c0)` c3)∈ c2, c5 ∈ c2)
  simpll(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ⊆ c2, (c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧(c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), ((invg ` c0)` c3)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp, c3 ∈ c2)
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ⊆ c2, (c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2), c0 ∈ Grp)
  ablgrp(c0)
  grpinvcl(c0, c3, c2, (invg ` c0))
  ablcom(c0, ((invg ` c0)` c3), c2, c5, (+ ` c0))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧(c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c2)), (c5[c6]c3)=(c5[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` c3)), c5 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  simprr((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), c3 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c2)
  simprl((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), c3 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c2)

  eqid((+ ` c0))
  eqid((invg ` c0))

  df-3an(c3 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c2, (c5[c6]c3)∈ c1)

blocks.content: A subgroup of an abelian group is also abelian. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Dec-2014.)

thm subgabl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))), wcel(c2, cabl))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, cress, c1))
} = {
  isabld(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))))

  simp1l(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), c1, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simp2(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  sseldd(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0), c1, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  syl(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  simp1r(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  subgss(c1, c0, cfv(cbs, c0))
  simp3(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  ablcom(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c0))))

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` c0))→ c2 ∈ Abel)

} = {

blocks.name: submcmn

blocks.name: cntzcmn

thm cntzcmn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), c2))

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ccntz, c0))

  eqssd(cfv(c3, c1), c2, wa(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  cntzssv(c3, c1, c2, c0)
  ssrdv(hs0, c2, cfv(c3, c1), wa(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2)))
  3expia(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, c1)))

  ralrimiva(hs1, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  sselda(cv(hs1), c1, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  cmncom(c0, cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, c1)), wral(hs1, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))))))
  cntzel(hs1, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c3, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs1.w(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmn), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CMnd ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→(c3 ` c1)= c2)

blocks.name: cntzspan
blocks.content: If the generators commute, the generated monoid is commutative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)

thm cntzspan(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1))), wcel(c3, ccmn))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, cfv(c4, c1)))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1))), wcel(c3, ccmn), wss(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c2, cfv(c4, c1))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1))), wss(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c2, cfv(c4, c1))), wcel(cfv(csubmnd, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))), wss(c1, cfv(c2, cfv(c4, c1))), wcel(cfv(c2, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1))), wss(c1, cfv(c2, cfv(c4, c1))), wss(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c2, c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1))), wss(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(csubmnd, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cfv(csubmnd, c0)), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  cntzsubm(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), c2)
  mrcsscl(cfv(csubmnd, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c1, cfv(c2, c1), c4)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1))), wb(wss(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c2, c1)), wss(c1, cfv(c2, cfv(c4, c1)))), wss(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  cntzrec(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(cbs, c0), c1, c2, c0)
  syldan(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(csubmnd, c0)), wss(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  mrcssvd(c4, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(csubmnd, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1))))
  cntzsubm(c0, cfv(c4, c1), cfv(cbs, c0), c2)
  mrcsscl(cfv(csubmnd, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c1, cfv(c2, cfv(c4, c1)), c4)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1))), wb(wcel(c3, ccmn), wss(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c2, cfv(c4, c1)))), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1))), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(csubmnd, c0)), wcel(cfv(csubmnd, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  acsmred(cfv(csubmnd, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cmnd), wss(c1, cfv(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(csubmnd, c0), cfv(cacs, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  submacs(c0, cfv(cbs, c0))

blocks.name: odadd2
blocks.content: The order of a product in an abelian group is divisible by the LCM of the orders of the factors divided by the GCD. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: odadd
blocks.content: The order of a product is the product of the orders, if the factors have coprime order. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm odadd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(cfv(c4, c1), cgcd, cfv(c4, c3)), nat1)), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(cfv(c4, c1), cmul, cfv(c4, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cod, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))

thm gexexlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))

  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cod, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c0, c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  syl22anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cdvds, c2), wbr(c2, cdvds, cfv(c0, c1)))
  nnnn0d(c2, w0)

  gexod(c4, c1, c3, c0, c2)

blocks.name: gexex
blocks.content: In an abelian group with finite exponent, there is an element in the group with order equal to the exponent. In other words, all orders of elements divide the largest order of an element of the group. This fails if ` E = 0 ` , for example in an infinite p-group, where there are elements of arbitrarily large orders (so ` E ` is zero) but no elements of infinite order. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)

  diff.clt.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: torsubg
blocks.content: The set of all elements of finite order forms a subgroup of any abelian group, called the torsion subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Oct-2015.)

thm torsubg(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Abel →(`' c1 " ℕ)∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  ⊣ c1 =(od ` c0)
} = {
  mpbir3and(c0 ∈ Abel, (`' c1 " ℕ)∈(SubGrp ` c0), (`' c1 " ℕ)⊆(Base ` c0), (`' c1 " ℕ)≠ ∅, ∀(hs0 ∈(`' c1 " ℕ),(∀(hs1 ∈(`' c1 " ℕ),(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈(`' c1 " ℕ))∧((invg ` c0)` hs0)∈(`' c1 " ℕ))))
  a1i(c0 ∈ Abel, (`' c1 " ℕ)⊆(Base ` c0))
  ne0d((`' c1 " ℕ), (0 ` c0), c0 ∈ Abel)
  sylanbrc(c0 ∈ Abel, (0 ` c0)∈(`' c1 " ℕ), (0 ` c0)∈(Base ` c0), (c1 `(0 ` c0))∈ ℕ)
  syl(c0 ∈ Abel, (0 ` c0)∈(Base ` c0), c0 ∈ Grp)
  grpidcl(c0, (0 ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  syl6eqel((c1 `(0 ` c0)), cn, nat1, c0 ∈ Abel)
  syl(c0 ∈ Abel, (c1 `(0 ` c0))= 1, c0 ∈ Grp)
  od1(c0, c1, (0 ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  1nn()
  ax-mp(((0 ` c0)∈(`' c1 " ℕ)↔((0 ` c0)∈(Base ` c0)∧(c1 `(0 ` c0))∈ ℕ)), c1[Fn](Base ` c0))
  elpreima(c1, (Base ` c0), (0 ` c0), cn)

blocks.name: oddvdssubg
blocks.content: The set of all elements whose order divides a fixed integer is a subgroup of any abelian group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsm, c0))
} = {

  2rexbidva(hs1, hs2, c1, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c3))))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c3))), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c2))

  sseldd(cv(hs1), c2, c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c3))))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)))

  simprr(w3a(wcel(c0, cabl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c3))
